meta.title: Vote Palestine
meta.description: Show your support for Palestine. Recognize the state, stop arms sales, stop illegal investments.

home.heroSubtitle: Demand action. Anonymous, secure, and in under one minute.
home.anonText: Your phone number is encrypted with one-way hashing. No one can see who voted.
home.intro: Here voters can show politicians what they think — and candidates can show voters where they stand. Can't see your candidate's position? Ask them to share it here.

candidates.title: Candidates
candidates.subtitle: Be the first candidate to take a stand on the three demands.
candidates.emptyText: Be the first candidate to publicly endorse the three demands.

about.title: About Vote Palestine
about.whatText: Vote Palestine is a civic platform where you can anonymously show your support for three concrete demands: recognition of the state of Palestine, stopping arms sales to Israel, and ending illegal investments in the occupation.
about.howIntro: We take your anonymity very seriously. Here's how it works:
about.howStep1Text: Enter your phone number and receive a ballot via SMS with a unique link.
about.howStep2Text: Open the link and vote yes or no on the three demands. Your phone number is encrypted with a one-way algorithm so it cannot be reconstructed.
about.howStep3Text: Each phone number can only vote once. The ballot expires after 24 hours.
about.howPrivacy: We store no IP addresses, no cookies, and no personal data in connection with votes.
about.bundleText: To protect early voters, the total vote count is only displayed once there are at least 50. Until then, only the collection status is shown.
about.security1: SHA-256 hashing of phone numbers with server-side salt

demands.d1Short: Denmark must officially recognize the state of Palestine.
demands.d1Long: Denmark must officially recognize the state of Palestine as a sovereign state.
demands.d2Short: Denmark must stop all sales and exports of weapons and military equipment to Israel.
demands.d2Long: All sales and exports of weapons and military equipment to Israel must be stopped.
demands.d3Short: Danish pension funds and public funds must divest from companies profiting from the illegal occupation.
demands.d3Long: Danish pension funds and public funds must divest from companies profiting from the illegal occupation.

vote.thanksText: Your vote has been registered. Invite your friends and make a difference.
vote.title: Vote Palestine
vote.chooseRole: Choose your role to get started.
vote.voterText: Cast your vote anonymously via SMS link.
vote.candidateText: Vote and show your position publicly.
vote.castSubtitle: Enter your phone number and receive a ballot via SMS.
vote.candidateNote: After voting, you can show your vote publicly as a candidate.
vote.privacyNote: Your phone number is encrypted with a one-way algorithm and cannot be traced back to you. Read more on the

results.bundleNote: Votes are shown anonymously. Yes/no breakdown appears after {threshold} votes.
results.publicVotesSubtitle: How Denmark votes on the three demands.

ballot.sentText: Check your SMS and click the link to cast your vote. The link expires in 24 hours.
ballot.thanksVoted: Your vote has been registered. Invite your friends and make a difference.
ballot.thanksCandidate: Your vote has been registered. You can now show it publicly.

ballot.expiredText: This ballot has expired. Go to the <link>vote page</link> to request a new one.

ballot.question: Do you support the three demands?
ballot.anonNote: Your vote is anonymous and cannot be traced back to your phone number.
ballot.voteInSmsNote: You choose Yes or No when you open the link on your phone.
ballot.phoneNote: Your phone number is encrypted and not stored. Only one vote per phone. {link}
ballot.optedOutConfirm: You will no longer receive messages from us.

invite.title: Invite friends
invite.sendBallot: Send ballot to a friend ({count} left)
invite.friendPhone: Enter your friend's phone number and we'll send a ballot.
invite.shareText: Cast your vote for the three demands.

inviteCandidate.how: How would you like to invite?
inviteCandidate.message: Hi! I'd like to invite you to take a stand on the three demands on Vote Palestine. Register as a candidate here:
inviteCandidate.emailSubject: Invitation: Take a stand on Vote Palestine
inviteCandidate.sendError: Could not send. Please try again.

mobileGate.title: Open on your phone
mobileGate.text: The ballot must be opened on the phone that received the SMS. This ensures each vote comes from a real device.
mobileGate.hint: Check your SMS and tap the link from your mobile.

candidateForm.submittedText: We will verify your information and your vote will be shown publicly once approved.
candidateForm.intro: As a candidate, you can show your vote publicly.
candidateForm.formIntro: Fill in your details. Your vote will be shown publicly after approval.
